A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I went into the movie with no expectations. I was not a fan of The Force Awakens. I am a fan of The Last Jedi. There is some poorly placed attempts at humor. There was some hokey spots in the movie. There are answers to your questions. I am not sure if those answers are misdirection or legitimate answers. The Saga is heading into a new direction but it remains Star Wars. With that said\, embrace the change as we all have to during our lives. The Star Wars Saga is in good hands with Ryan Johnson.
